dc_title_s: Hammond's complete map of Iowa : showing electric and steam railroads, counties, congressional districts, and all cities, towns and villages : together with a new postal and shipping guide giving in detail railroads and the express company doing business over each road, money order post offices.
dc_description_s: (W 96⁰30ʹ--W 90⁰00ʹ/N 43⁰45ʹ--N 40⁰15ʹ).   Also shows inter-urban electric lines projected or under construction at time of publication.   Cover title.   Index to Iowa cities and towns, with 1910 census information and postal and shipping guide, on verso.|39 x 55 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:1,005,800|General Map Collection
